mn83:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava mithilayam viharati maghadevaambavane.
mn83:2.1: Atha kho bhagava annatarasmim padese sitam patvakasi.
mn83:2.3: “ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa patukammaya?
mn83:2.5: Atha kho ayasma anando ekamsam civaram katva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn83:2.6: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa patukammaya?
mn83:3.1: “Bhutapubbam, ananda, imissayeva mithilayam raja ahosi maghadevo nama dhammiko dhammaraja dhamme thito maharaja;
mn83:3.2: dhammam carati brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca;
mn83:3.3: uposathanca upavasati catuddasim pancadasim atthaminca pakkhassa.
mn83:4.1: Atha kho, ananda, raja maghadevo bahunam vassanam bahunam vassasatanam bahunam vassasahassanam accayena kappakam amantesi:
mn83:4.2: ‘yada me, samma kappaka, passeyyasi sirasmim palitani jatani, atha me aroceyyasi’ti.
mn83:4.3: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, ananda, kappako ranno maghadevassa paccassosi.
mn83:4.4: Addasa kho, ananda, kappako bahunam vassanam bahunam vassasatanam bahunam vassasahassanam accayena ranno maghadevassa sirasmim palitani jatani.
mn83:4.6: ‘patubhuta kho devassa devaduta, dissanti sirasmim palitani jatani’ti.
mn83:4.7: ‘Tena hi, samma kappaka, tani palitani sadhukam sandasena uddharitva mama anjalismim patitthapehi’ti.
mn83:4.8: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, ananda, kappako ranno maghadevassa patissutva tani palitani sadhukam sandasena uddharitva ranno maghadevassa anjalismim patitthapesi.
mn83:4.9: Atha kho, ananda, raja maghadevo kappakassa gamavaram datva jetthaputtam kumaram amantapetva etadavoca:
mn83:4.12: bhutta kho pana me manusaka kama;
mn83:4.14: Ehi tvam, tata kumara, imam rajjam patipajja.
mn83:4.15: Aham pana kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajissami.
mn83:4.16: Tena hi, tata kumara, yada tvampi passeyyasi sirasmim palitani jatani, atha kappakassa gamavaram datva jetthaputtam kumaram sadhukam rajje samanusasitva kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyyasi.
mn83:4.17: Yena me idam kalyanam vattam nihitam anuppavatteyyasi, ma kho me tvam antimapuriso ahosi.
mn83:4.18: Yasmim kho, tata kumara, purisayuge vattamane evarupassa kalyanassa vattassa samucchedo hoti so tesam antimapuriso hoti.
mn83:4.19: Tam taham, tata kumara, evam vadami—
mn83:4.20: yena me idam kalyanam vattam nihitam anuppavatteyyasi, ma kho me tvam antimapuriso ahosi’ti.
mn83:5.1: Atha kho, ananda, raja maghadevo kappakassa gamavaram datva jetthaputtam kumaram sadhukam rajje samanusasitva imasmimyeva maghadevaambavane kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbaji.
mn83:5.2: So mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva vihasi, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham; iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva vihasi.
mn83:5.5: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva vihasi, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham; iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva vihasi.

mn83:6.2: So cattaro brahmavihare bhavetva kayassa bheda param marana brahmalokupago ahosi.

mn83:10.2: Te mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharimsu, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham; iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharimsu.

mn83:12.1: Nimi tesam raja pacchimako ahosi dhammiko dhammaraja dhamme thito maharaja;
mn83:12.2: dhammam carati brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca;

mn83:13.1: Bhutapubbam, ananda, devanam tavatimsanam sudhammayam sabhayam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
mn83:13.2: ‘labha vata, bho, videhanam, suladdham vata, bho, videhanam,
mn83:13.3: yesam nimi raja dhammiko dhammaraja dhamme thito maharaja;
mn83:13.4: dhammam carati brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca;
mn83:13.5: uposathanca upavasati catuddasim pancadasim atthaminca pakkhassa’ti.
mn83:13.6: Atha kho, ananda, sakko devanamindo deve tavatimse amantesi:
mn83:13.7: ‘iccheyyatha no tumhe, marisa, nimim rajanam datthun’ti?
mn83:13.9: Tena kho pana, ananda, samayena nimi raja tadahuposathe pannarase sisamnhato uposathiko uparipasadavaragato nisinno hoti.
mn83:13.10: Atha kho, ananda, sakko devanamindo—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—devesu tavatimsesu antarahito nimissa ranno pamukhe paturahosi.
mn83:13.11: Atha kho, ananda, sakko devanamindo nimim rajanam etadavoca:
mn83:13.13: Deva, maharaja, tavatimsa sudhammayam sabhayam kittayamanarupa sannisinna:
mn83:13.14: “labha vata, bho, videhanam, suladdham vata, bho, videhanam,
mn83:13.15: yesam nimi raja dhammiko dhammaraja dhamme thito maharaja;
mn83:13.16: dhammam carati brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca;
mn83:13.17: uposathanca upavasati catuddasim pancadasim atthaminca pakkhassa”ti.
mn83:13.19: Tassa te aham, maharaja, sahassayuttam ajannaratham pahinissami;
mn83:13.21: Adhivasesi kho, ananda, nimi raja tunhibhavena.
mn83:13.22: Atha kho, ananda, sakko devanamindo nimissa ranno adhivasanam viditva—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—nimissa ranno pamukhe antarahito devesu tavatimsesu paturahosi.
mn83:14.1: Atha kho, ananda, sakko devanamindo matalim sangahakam amantesi:
mn83:14.2: ‘ehi tvam, samma matali, sahassayuttam ajannaratham yojetva nimim rajanam upasankamitva evam vadehi—
mn83:14.3: ayam te, maharaja, sahassayutto ajannaratho sakkena devanamindena pesito;
mn83:14.5: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, ananda, matali sangahako sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva sahassayuttam ajannaratham yojetva nimim rajanam upasankamitva etadavoca:
mn83:14.6: ‘ayam te, maharaja, sahassayutto ajannaratho sakkena devanamindena pesito;
mn83:14.8: Api ca, maharaja, katamena tam nemi, yena va papakamma papakanam kammanam vipakam patisamvedenti, yena va kalyanakamma kalyanakammanam vipakam patisamvedenti’ti?
mn83:15.1: Sampavesesi kho, ananda, matali, sangahako nimim rajanam sudhammam sabham.
mn83:15.2: Addasa kho, ananda, sakko devanamindo nimim rajanam duratova agacchantam.
mn83:15.6: Deva te dassanakama, maharaja, tavatimsa sudhammayam sabhayam kittayamanarupa sannisinna:

mn83:15.8: yesam nimi raja dhammiko dhammaraja dhamme thito maharaja;
mn83:15.9: dhammam carati brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca;
mn83:15.10: uposathanca upavasati catuddasim pancadasim atthaminca pakkhassa”ti.

mn83:20.1: Nimissa kho panananda, ranno kalarajanako nama putto ahosi.
mn83:21.1: Siya kho pana te, ananda, evamassa:
mn83:21.2: ‘anno nuna tena samayena raja maghadevo ahosi, yena tam kalyanam vattam nihitan’ti.
mn83:21.3: Na kho panetam, ananda, evam datthabbam.
mn83:21.4: Aham tena samayena raja maghadevo ahosim.
mn83:21.5: Aham tam kalyanam vattam nihinim, maya tam kalyanam vattam nihitam;
mn83:21.7: Tam kho panananda, kalyanam vattam na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattati, yavadeva brahmalokupapattiya.
mn83:21.8: Idam kho panananda, etarahi maya kalyanam vattam nihitam ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
mn83:21.9: Katamancananda, etarahi maya kalyanam vattam nihitam ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati?
mn83:21.11: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
mn83:21.12: Idam kho, ananda, etarahi maya kalyanam vattam nihitam ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.

mn83:21.14: ‘yena me idam kalyanam vattam nihitam anuppavatteyyatha, ma kho me tumhe antimapurisa ahuvattha’.
